name: Crux - Bull & Bear - Toro
additionalNotes: Crux Bull and Bear cigars designed with a larger than life ring gauge in each vitola, this bold full bodied stogie is rolled using grade A tobacco with a bold Nicaraguan Habano wrapper that completely blows your taste buds out of the water.Â Hand-crafted with a vintage Nicaraguan Habano wrapper, the grade-A tobacco blend presents smokers with notes of smoky cedar, cocoa chocolate and peppery spice. The unique flavor profile and top-quality construction make this cigar a great smoke from start to finish.
